import React , {Component} from 'react'; import "./cart.js"; class CatProductArea extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.state = { products: [ { "id": "1", "img": "img/product/feature-product/f-p-1.jpg", "name": "Long Sleeve TShirt", "price": "$159.00" }, { "id": "2", "img": "img/product/feature-product/f-p-2.jpg", "name": "Long Sleeve TShirt", "price": "$150.00" }, { "id": "3", "img": "img/product/feature-product/f-p-3.jpg", "name": "Long Sleeve TShirt", "price": "$150.00" }, { "id": "4", "img": "img/product/feature-product/f-p-4.jpg", "name": "Long Sleeve TShirt", "price": "$150.00" }, { "id": "5", "img": "img/product/feature-product/f-p-5.jpg", "name": "Long Sleeve TShirt", "price": "$150.00" }, { "id": "6", "img": "img/product/feature-product/f-p-6.jpg", "name": "Long Sleeve TShirt", "price": "$150.00" }, { "id": "7", "img": "img/product/feature-product/f-p-1.jpg", "name": "Long Sleeve TShirt", "price": "$159.00" }, { "id": "8", "img": "img/product/feature-product/f-p-2.jpg", "name": "Long Sleeve TShirt", "price": "$150.00" }, { "id": "9", "img": "img/product/feature-product/f-p-3.jpg", "name": "Long Sleeve TShirt", "price": "$150.00" }, { "id": "10", "img": "img/product/feature-product/f-p-4.jpg", "name": "Long Sleeve TShirt", "price": "$150.00" }, { "id": "11", "img": "img/product/feature-product/f-p-5.jpg", "name": "Long Sleeve TShirt", "price": "$150.00" }, { "id": "12", "img": "img/product/feature-product/f-p-6.jpg", "name": "Long Sleeve TShirt", "price": "$150.00" } ], testarray: ['1', '2', '3', '4', '5'], testjson: { "name": "nonso" }, cart : ['cart1'], no_of_items : 1, } this.addcart = this.addcart.bind(this); this.page = this.page.bind(this); } addcart = (id) =>{ // this.setState({ cart : this.state.cart.}); console.log("items in cart : " + this.state.cart); console.log("Item with this index added : " + id); // j } page(no){ number = this.state.no_of_items.setState({ no_of_items : no_of_items * no }) return number; } render() { return (
